document.masterDocTitle: Description of Nasocoris lautereri sp. nov. from the Balkan peninsula, with a review of the genus Nasocoris (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Description of Nasocoris lautereri sp. nov. from the Balkan peninsula, with a review of the genus Nasocoris (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae)

bibRefCitation.author: Lindberg
bibRefCitation.refString: Lindberg, H. (1939) Neue Heteropteren aus Aegypten. Bulletin de la Societe Fouad I er d'Entomologie, 1938, 10 - 21.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lectotype . Male, ‘ Egypt ., Min. Agric., W.[adi] Feiran,
17 .V. 1934
, coll. Prof Priesner’ ( MZHF ) (
Huldén et al. 1996
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Nasocoris albipennis : Linnavuori ( 1999 ): 52
–55, 59– 62 . Redescription, key, figures, bionomics, host plant, ecology, distribution, faunistics ( Egypt : Sinai; Iran ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Nasocoris albipennis :
Linnavuori and Modarres ( 1999 )
: 224
. Bionomics, host plant, faunistics ( Iran ).

Nasocoris albipennis :
Linnavuori
( 2004 a): 12–13 . Key, figures.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution. Egypt (Sinai peninsula) (
Lindberg 1939
;
Linnavuori 1968
, 1999;
Priesner and Alfieri 1953
), Iran (Linnavuori 1999 ,
Linnavuori and Modarres 1999
). Records from Iraq (
Linnavuori 1993
) belong to
N. tuberculicollis
, from Israel (
Linnavuori 1961
, 1962 ) to
N. artemis
, and from Saudi Arabia (
Linnavuori 1986
) to
N. arabicus
.

Host plants.
Ephedra alata
( Egypt : Sinai) (
Linnavuori 1964
, 1968 , 1999 ),
Ephedra
sp. ( Iran ) (
Linnavuori and Modarres 1999
). Records from
Haloxylon schweinfurthi
( Chenopodiaceae ) from Sinai by
Lindberg ( 1939 )
,
Priesner and Alfieri ( 1953 )
, and
Stichel ( 1956 )
seem to be sitting records.

Bionomics. Adults were collected in May (
Lindberg 1939
,
Priesner and Alfieri 1953
,
Linnavuori and Modarres 1999
, Linnavuori 1999 ), June (
Linnavuori and Modarres 1999
, Linnavuori 1999 ) and September (
Linnavuori 1964
, 1968 , 1999 ).
